snippet: New York will soon allow the limited use of medical marijuana for seriously ill patients under a plan the state's governor will announce in the next few days, the New York Times reported on Saturday....

headline.print_headline: New York Gov. Cuomo to Allow Limited Use of Medical Marijuana: Paper
headline.main: New York Gov. Cuomo to Allow Limited Use of Medical Marijuana: Paper

lead_paragraph: New York will soon allow the limited use of medical marijuana for seriously ill patients under a plan the state's governor will announce in the next few days, the New York Times reported on Saturday.
